lead_paragraph: This harpist and composer presented her “Filigree in Textile” and other works.

headline.print_headline: Review: Hannah Lash and Her ‘Life Partner’ at Miller Theater
headline.main: Review: Hannah Lash and Her ‘Life Partner’ at Miller Theater

snippet: This harpist and composer presented her “Filigree in Textile” and other works.
abstract: Vivien Schweitzer reviews performances by JACK Quartet, Loadbang and Lisa Moore, playing works by Hannah Lash, including two premieres, as part of Composer Portraits series at Columbia University's Miller Theater.
